verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Give praise to the Living One, Who died and rose on high, Who never more shall die, Whose glory I shall see… And I’ll praise and exalt the Living One, Who triumphs through me. (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: Praise the Living One Sisters: Praise the Living One Brothers: Praise the Living One Sisters: Praise the Living One Brothers: Praise the Living One Sisters: Praise the One All: Who triumphs through me. (repeat){/lang-eng}
